headline: Church & Dwight (CHD) Q3 Earnings and Revenues Top Estimates
summary: Church & Dwight (CHD) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of +10.96% and +3.32%, respectively, for the quarter ended September 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Church & Dwight (NYSE:CHD) Exceeds Q3 Expectations
summary: Household products company Church & Dwight (NYSE:CHD) reported Q3 CY2025 results beating Wall Street’s revenue expectations, with sales up 5% year on year to $1.59 billion. The company expects next quarter’s revenue to be around $1.64 billion, close to analysts’ estimates. Its non-GAAP profit of $0.81 per share was 10.1% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

raw.headline: Church & Dwight (NYSE:CHD) Exceeds Q3 Expectations
raw.summary: Household products company Church & Dwight (NYSE:CHD) reported Q3 CY2025 results beating Wall Street’s revenue expectations, with sales up 5% year on year to $1.59 billion. The company expects next quarter’s revenue to be around $1.64 billion, close to analysts’ estimates. Its non-GAAP profit of $0.81 per share was 10.1% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Church & Dwight: Q3 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The results exceeded Wall Street expectations. The average estimate of 10 analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for earnings of 73 cents per share. The maker of household and personal products posted revenue of $1.59 billion in the period, which also beat Street forecasts.

raw.headline: Church & Dwight: Q3 Earnings Snapshot

The maker of household and personal products posted revenue of $1.59 billion in the period, which also beat Street forecasts.

headline: Church & Dwight Reports Q3 2025 Results
summary: EWING, N.J., October 31, 2025--Church & Dwight Co., Inc. (NYSE: CHD) today reported strong third quarter results highlighted by strong innovation, marketing and sales execution leading to share gains in many of our brands. Our third quarter reported net sales increased 5.0% to $1,585.6 million. Organic sales increased 3.4% driven by volume growth of 4.0% partially offset by negative pricing and mix of 0.6%.

raw.headline: Church & Dwight Reports Q3 2025 Results
raw.summary: EWING, N.J., October 31, 2025--Church & Dwight Co., Inc.
